events.name: First Meetup
events.description: Our first meetup will be Open Space Style.  No agenda in particular.   Everyone is free to propose topics including topics you like to discuss on our future meetups.  Lightning talks of 2 to 5 minutes on any talking-points are welcome. Ideally I like to discuss issues we’ve encountered and more importantly share on how we’ve fixed them.  Knowledge sharing.
events.location: PropertyGuru, 51 Goldhill Plaza #11-03 (circular building next to United Square), Singapore

events.name: Electronic Music Lab Welcome Tea | 2015
events.description:
The NUS Electronic Music Lab (EML) is opening its doors once again this August to welcome you to our family!

To those interested in finding out more about what EML does or are planning on joining us, feel free to come down (you don't have to be an NUS student).

There will be snacks!
events.location: NUS Runme Shaw CFA Studios, Activity Room

events.name: HackerspaceSG Awesome Talks, August 2015
events.description:
For our inaugural edition of Hackerspace Awesome Talks, we are excited to welcome Carter Emmart and Aaron Maniam. 

Carter is the Director of Astrovisualization at the American Museum of Natural History. He is a storyteller, weaving together the knowledge that science uncovers about our universe and the technicalities of visualisation to create immersive experiences. He is also heading up the development of a 3D atlas called The Digital Universe. Sit tight as he takes us on a trip round our universe!

Amongst many things that nourish him, Aaron is poet inspired by the solitude and beauty he finds in nature. He will be reading some of his poems, as well as sharing about his involvement in an anthology of local poetry titled From Walden to Woodlands.
